testcase.name: Test with backend "before each" hook: log to app for "verify correct request and response"
testcase.classname: "before each" hook: log to app for "verify correct request and response"

failure.message:
`cy.request()` failed on:
https://conduit-api.bondaracademy.com/api/users/login
The response we received from your web server was:
> 403: Forbidden
This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.
If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`
-----------------------------------------------------------
The request we sent was:
Method: POST URL: https://conduit-api.bondaracademy.com/api/users/login Headers: { "Connection": "keep-alive", "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Cypress/13.17.0 Chrome/118.0.5993.159 Electron/27.3.10 Safari/537.36", "accept": "*/*", "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate", "content-type": "application/json", "content-length": 53 } Body: {"user":{"email":"$username","password":"$password"}}
-----------------------------------------------------------
The response we got was:
Status: 403 - Forbidden Headers: { "x-powered-by": "Express", "vary": "Origin", "content-type": "application/json; charset=utf-8", "etag": "W/\"2f-83PWxEwXkLR3WfVjo3wqB0FwKlU\"", "x-cloud-trace-context": "e5c8c801ddd854ec79c85d727d55e130", "date": "Thu, 09 Jan 2025 19:56:29 GMT", "server": "Google Frontend", "content-length": "47" } Body: { "errors": { "email or password": [ "is invalid" ] } }
https://on.cypress.io/request
Because this error occurred during a `before each` hook we are skipping the remaining tests in the current suite: `Test with backend`
